description: Retrieves the resource shares associated with an account. Use the filter parameter to retrieve a specific subset of the shares.

parameters.name: resourceOwner
parameters.description: The account that owns the resource shares.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Attributes that you use to filter for a specific subset of resource shares. resourceArns (list) --- Filter based on the Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the resource. You can specify up to 10 values. (string) --- status (list) --- Filter based on the resource status. (string) --- type (list) --- The type of resources to be filtered. You can specify one or more of the resource types. (string) ---

nested_params.name: resourceArns
nested_params.description: Filter based on the Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the resource. You can specify up to 10 values.

nested_params.name: status
nested_params.description: Filter based on the resource status. You can specify up to 10 values.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The type of resources to be filtered. You can specify one or more of the resource types.

nested_items.name: shares
nested_items.description: The shares available and their metadata details.

nested_items.name: shareId
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource share.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The Arn of the shared resource.

nested_items.name: resourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the shared resource.

nested_items.name: principalSubscriber
nested_items.description: The principal subscriber is the account that is sharing the resource.

nested_items.name: ownerId
nested_items.description: The account ID for the data owner. The owner creates the resource share.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message for a resource share. It provides additional details about the share status.

nested_items.name: shareName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource share.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the resource share was created.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the resource share update.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: Next token returned in the response of a previous ListSharesResponse call. Used to get the next page of results.
